title: Announcements have arrived
body: We decided that we needed a way to communicate directly to our users so we made the announcements page. Check back here for new features and other important messages.

title: iBGG 1.2 Released!
body: We're proud to announce the release of some pretty neat feature including: in-app announcements, iOS App equivalents of your favorite boardgames, and TONS of performance improvements & bug fixes. Version 2.0 is hot on it's heals. As always, if you notice any issues, please let us know.

title: iBGG 2.0 in Development!
body: We're proud to announce that we're working on some really great features for iBGG. We've had a lot of requests for the ability to login and manage your plays on BGG so that is something we're trying to work through and make sure we get right. This functionality it coming in the next major release so keep your eyes open for it.
